title: Bitcoin Holding Above $26K Is ‘Remarkable’ as Equities Take a Hit. What’s Next for BTC’s Price?
description: The 200-week and 200-day moving averages converge at $27,800, acting as an obstacle to further BTC price gains.

title: Unity Apologizes, Walks Back Fee Changes After Game Developer Backlash
description: Game engine giant Unity isn’t killing its despised runtime fee, but it is offering developers options to avoid it or otherwise reduce costs.

title: Tether Calls Out WSJ ‘Tabloid Style’ Reporting, States Outlet ‘Disregarded’ Reporting Banking Industry Woes
description: Tether, the company behind the issuance of USDT, the largest stablecoin in the crypto market, has called out the latest report of the Wall Street Journal (WSJ) on the rise of its loan portfolio. The company stated that traditional banking institutions were “not addressing the needs of their customers” while facing “significant challenges,” with the […]

title: Balancer DAO salutes defi response team for aid in $230K UI exploit
description: Balancer DAO, a decentralized autonomous organization governing the protocol, protocol thanked a team of security experts for their help following a DNS attack on a top level .fi domain registrar employed by Balancer. Balancer DAO called attention to SEAL 911,…

title: Bitcoin Risks Breaking Below $23K in Classic Pre-Halving Slump
description:
The cryptocurrency analyst and trader Benjamin Cowen warned that the price of Bitcoin (BTC) could drop to $23K, and possibly even below this mark, through the course of the next few weeks. In his analysis, Cowen based his prediction on the performance of BTC during the month of September in previous pre-halving years. Although September […]
